comment.author: 23370828@N08
comment._content:
The bus was operated by Sargeants Motors of Kington.
FO 4711, New in 1946 & was a Bedford OB with a Mulliner 30 seat body.
After the accident It was rebodied with a Duple Vista 29 seat coach body & then saw service with Bevan of Littledean & Wye Valley Motors in Hereford

comment.author: 35005310@N02
comment._content: Unlike a lot of modern coaches the roof on this one didnt collapse on its passengers!
